# Pairing
Step 1: Remove the remote from previous zigbee network if it has already been added to it, otherwise pairing will fail. Please refer to the part "Factory Reset Manually".
Step 2: Press and hold down "Prog." button until LED indicator turns on.
Step 3: Immediately short press "S1" button to search nearby network, indicator flashes every 1 second, 20 seconds timeout if there is no network. Indicator will then blink 5 times quickly for successful pairing.

# Factory Reset Manually
Step 1: Press and hold down "Prog." button until LED indicator turns on.
Step 2: Immediately short press 5 times "Prog." button continuously, indicator flashes 3 times quickly to indicate successful reset.
